mapper.select: SELECT p.name, p.id, s.id, s.name FROM properties p, statuses s WHERE p.status_id = s.id AND s.name = 'Active' ORDER BY p.name
SELECT id, name FROM properties as prop WHERE name = #{name}
SELECT attr.name FROM attributes as attr WHERE attr.property_id = #{pid} AND status_id = (SELECT id FROM statuses WHERE name = 'Active')
mapper.update: UPDATE properties p, statuses s SET p.status_id = s.id WHERE s.name = 'Inactive' AND p.name = #{property}
UPDATE properties p, statuses s SET p.status_id = s.id WHERE s.name = 'Active' AND p.name = #{property}

UPDATE attributes a, statuses s SET a.status_id = s.id WHERE s.name = 'Active' AND a.property_id = #{pid} AND a.name IN
#{item}

UPDATE attributes a, statuses s SET a.status_id = s.id WHERE s.name = 'Inactive' AND a.property_id = #{pid} AND a.name IN
#{item}
UPDATE attributes a, statuses s SET a.status_id = s.id WHERE s.name = 'Inactive' AND a.property_id = #{pid}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO properties (name, status_id) VALUES (#{newProperty}, (SELECT id FROM statuses WHERE name = 'Active'))

INSERT INTO attributes (property_id, name, status_id) VALUES
(#{pid}, #{item}, (SELECT id FROM statuses WHERE name = 'Active'))
INSERT INTO logs_attributes (log_id, attribute_id, value) VALUES (#{lid}, (SELECT id FROM attributes WHERE name = #{attribute} AND property_id = #{pid}), #{value})
